728974f-a.title: Richmond: Hunton Street - Holly Street
728974f-a.text:
(1)
Hunton Street, at Holly Street, showing part of the land of
the Mt. Hope Park Development in Dongan Hills. This is part of
the M.D. Hunton property.
May 19, 1926.
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTiONS
(2)
Dogwood Blossoms near Hunton Street on the M.D. Hunton prope
which is being developed into the Mt. Hope Park Development.
May 19, 1926.
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(3)
Another view near Hunton and Holly Streets.
May 19, 1926.
P. L. Sperr
728974f-a.folder: Hunton Street & Holly Street, Staten Island, NY

728973f-a.title: Richmond: Hunton Street - Holly Street
728973f-a.text:
Hunton Street, near Holly Street, showing dogwood blossoms
on the M.D. Hunton property which is being developed into the
Mount Hope Park Development. This is a set of three views taken
the same day.
May 19, 1926
Views 1,2 and 3
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
